file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-26-04-04 - MAIN-DOOR COURTESY LIGHT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR COURTESY LIGHT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the main-door courtesy-light lamp and the main-door courtesy-light assembly. B. The main-door courtesy light is installed on the main-door ceiling panel and helps to light the stairs, entry area, aisle toward the cockpit, and the passenger cabin. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY MAIN-DOOR COURTESY-LIGHT LAMP - ALL 33-26-04-000-801-A REMOVAL MAIN-DOOR COURTESY-LIGHT LAMP - ALL 33-26-04-400-801-A INSTALLATION MAIN-DOOR COURTESY-LIGHT ASSEM- ALL 33-26-04-000-802-A BLY - REMOVAL MAIN-DOOR COURTESY-LIGHT ASSEM- ALL 33-26-04-400-802-A BLY - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-26-04 Page 1 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-26-04-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MAIN-DOOR COURTESY-LIGHT LAMP - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the main-door courtesy-light lamp. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Passenger cabin (main-door ceiling 233 233ALC panel) C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin (main-door ceiling panel) H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that courtesy light switch, on the entrance panel, is in the OFF position and attach a DO-NOT-TURN-ON tag to it. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Carefully pull the lens (2) to remove it. (2) Remove the courtesy lamp (3) from the light housing assembly (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-26-04 Page 2 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Main-Door Courtesy-Light Lamp - Removal/Installation Figure 401 ZONES B 233 A EXIT DET. A MAIN-DOOR CEILING PANEL (REF.) 1. LIGHT HOUSING ASSEMBLY 3. COURTESY LAMP DET. B 2. LENS 145AMM330180.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-26-04 Page 3 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-26-04-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. MAIN-DOOR COURTESY-LIGHT LAMP - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the main-door courtesy-light lamp. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 33-26-00-700-801-A/500 COURTESY/STAIR LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Passenger cabin (main-door ceiling 233 233ALC panel) D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin (main-door ceiling panel) I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the courtesy lamp (3) in the light housing assembly (1). (2) Carefully install the lens (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the DO-NOT-TURN-ON tag from the courtesy light switch. (2) Do the Courtesy/Stair lights test ( AMM TASK 33-26-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-26-04 Page 4 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-26-04-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 4. MAIN-DOOR COURTESY-LIGHT ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the main-door courtesy-light assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-802-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Passenger cabin (main-door ceiling 233 233ALC panel) D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin (main-door ceiling panel) I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Make sure that courtesy light switch, on the entrance panel, is in the OFF position and attach a DO-NOT-TURN-ON tag to it. (2) Remove the main-door ceiling panel. Refer to (AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-801-A/400) or (AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-802-A/400), as applicable. J. Removal (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) Carefully pull the lens (8) to remove it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-26-04 Page 5 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the screws (1) and washers (2) that attach the light housing assembly (3) to the main-door ceiling panel. (3) Remove the screws (6) and washers (4) and (7) that attach the terminal lugs (5) to the light housing assembly (3). (4) Remove the light housing assembly (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-26-04 Page 6 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Main-Door Courtesy-Light Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 402 ZONES B 233 A EXIT DET. A MAIN-DOOR C CEILING PANEL (REF.) 1. SCREW (4) 2. WASHER (4) DET. B 3. LIGHT HOUSING ASSEMBLY 5. TERMINAL LUG (4) 4. WASHER (4) 6. SCREW (4) 7. WASHER (4) 8. LENS DET. C 145AMM330173.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-26-04 Page 7 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-26-04-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 5. MAIN-DOOR COURTESY-LIGHT ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the main-door courtesy-light assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 33-26-00-700-801-A/500 COURTESY/STAIR LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Passenger cabin (main-door ceiling 233 233ALC panel) D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin (main-door ceiling panel) I. Installation (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) Install the screws (6) and washers (4) and (7) to attach the terminal lugs (5) to the light housing assembly (3). (2) Put the light housing assembly (3) in its installation position. (3) Install the screws (1) and washers (2) that attach the light housing assembly (3) to the main-door ceiling panel. (4) Carefully install the lens (8). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 33-26-04 Page 8 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Install the main-door ceiling panel. Refer to (AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-801-A/400) or (AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-802-A/400), as applicable. (2) Remove the DO-NOT-TURN-ON tag from the courtesy light switch. (3) Do the Courtesy/Stair lights test ( AMM TASK 33-26-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 33-26-04 Page 9 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
